I've never really liked anything as much as I like being a dad.
I mean, the first week after we brought him home, I went way, way overboard with the pictures.
Even his mom was like, "You need to chill out, man."
I just didn't want to forget that stuff,...
But then I did manage to forget one thing,...
The phone was whatever. I'd lost like a million phones.
But this time, it was different because it did actually matter.
Every photo I'd ever taken of him, I'd taken on that phone.
Then, I realized that I hadn't lost anything at all.
